page.title: 06New Bungalows.
page.content: Eight bungalows are being built in Gt.Addington where people used to park their lorries.A house has been built next to the Hare and Hounds public house.There is also a big house that has been built on top of a bungalow.The windows are small to save money on heating but yet some of the houses have fairly big windows.Two houses have different coloured bricks. People used to call the place where the eight bungalows are the lorry park or the green.The roofs are all built of tiles on all of the new buildings.There are nine rooms in the bungalows.In the bungalows there are two garages and one chimney pot on each one.
